title: I'm gonna keep saying this even if I keep getting downvoted.
body:
Ap champs going top are a FUCKING PROBLEM! Guess who is now becoming and I hate to say this but FOTM?? Kennen.

That's right, Kennen now alongside rumble and lissandra melee champs with no forms of movement speed are getting pushed out of top.

Downvote me if you want, But I'll keep raising this issue until a Rioter on the balance team thinks this is fine that almost 3 champions can dictate who can go top now.

It's basically the shyvana, renekton, and mundo triangle all over again.
